mdRecord.dcterms:title: Mr. Jefferson's last letter
Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826. Letter to the Mayor of Washington. 1826
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
Washington (D.C.). Mayor.
Weightman, R. C.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Dated: Monticello, June 24, 1826. The letter was written to the Mayor of Washington, D.C., in reply to an invitation to attend the Fourth of July celebration there.
Printed on silk; text within ornamental border.
Also published in 1826 under titles "Mr. Jefferson's letter to the Mayor of Washington" and "Thomas Jefferson's last letter."
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Tracy W. McGregor Library, American History Collection.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: United States.--Declaration of Independence
Fourth of July celebrations--Washington (D.C.)
